name: Emerald Jack
description: Two highly touted strains harmonize to form the flavorful, sativa-driven hybrid Emerald Jack. Jack Herer, with its amazing spectrum of earthy flavors and heady effects, combines with the pungent sour aromas of Emerald OG to give life to Emerald Jack’s unique terpene profile. Its aroma is a vivid mix of earthy and pine zest that excites the senses and forms flavors of skunky citrus upon exhale. The resulting effects are uplifting, energetic, and are known to inspire creativity. Many chose Emerald Jack for daytime use and its ability to maintain productivity and a clear head.
descriptionPlain: Two highly touted strains harmonize to form the flavorful, sativa-driven hybrid Emerald Jack. Jack Herer, with its amazing spectrum of earthy flavors and heady effects, combines with the pungent sour aromas of Emerald OG to give life to Emerald Jack’s unique terpene profile. Its aroma is a vivid mix of earthy and pine zest that excites the senses and forms flavors of skunky citrus upon exhale. The resulting effects are uplifting, energetic, and are known to inspire creativity. Many chose Emerald Jack for daytime use and its ability to maintain productivity and a clear head.

highlightedReviews.text: Some weed makes you get up and dance. Some weed makes you take off your pants. Some weed puts you right in a trance. Then there's this stuff. I hate to speak ill of greenbud, especially stuff that 20 years ago would have knocked my socks off, but compared to the other strains I've tried, this is just "meh". The high is heavy-headed, full-body and no-energy; if this is what you're after then be of good cheer, because the high lasts a good couple of hours. The downside is that you'll also feel like you just stepped off the Spin'n'Puke at the county fair. The dizziness wasn't quite THAT bad, but the feeling of sidewaysness constantly intruded into the high, kinda like when your mom would knock on your door when you were trying to watch skeezy anime. That said, Emerald Jack is only $10 a gram, so if you DO want to feel numb and dizzy, you can either spin around and around and around in an office chair, then fall on your head or just cough up the 10 bucks at your local pot shop. Don'tcha just love choices?

I tried this for the first time and I’m happy and trying to get off the couch. I want to paint, garden, and cook but should have decided an activity before I hit the joint again. Budget functional bud as I write this I’m standing heading to the kitchen.

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Medusa, Purple Chemdawg, Emerald Jack, American Kush, and Key Lime Pie
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
The much-needed weekend has almost arrived, which means it's about time to snuggle up with your favorite relaxing indica or get out and see the world with a nice, uplifting sativa. Whichever you prefer, we've added new options for you to explore, rate, and review! Here are five of the most in-demand strains according to your requests via the Leafly app, but be sure to check out other new additions here.
   1. Medusa
Characteristics of Medusa:

Hybrid strain
Derived from Misty genetics
Breeder: Nirvana Seeds
Sweet, earthy blueberry aroma
Sedating body effects with clear-headed cerebral activity
May help with sleep issues and body pains

   2. Purple Chemdawg
Characteristics of Purple Chemdawg:

75/25 indica-dominant strain
Cross between Chemdawg and Granddaddy Purple 
Sweet grape aroma
Weighs heavy on the body, but leaves the mind free to wander creative, introspective realms
May help with chronic pain, stress, and anxiety

   3. Emerald Jack
Characteristics of Emerald Jack:

70/30 sativa-dominant strain
Cross between Jack Herer and Emerald OG
Pine, skunk, and citrus flavors
Effects are uplifting, energetic, and creative

   4. American Kush
Characteristics of American Kush:

70/30 indica-dominant strain
Cross between Pre-98 Bubba Kush and Sin City Kush
Breeder: Alphakronik Genes
Delivers relaxing body effects
Lemon, spicy, lavender, and coffee flavors
May help with muscle spasms, chronic pain, and nausea

   5. Key Lime Pie
Characteristics of Key Lime Pie:

Hybrid strain
GSC (f.k.a Girl Scout Cookies) phenotype
Breeder: Burning Bush Nurseries
Produces relaxing body effects
Lime candy, mint, and spice aroma
May help with pain and insomnia
